title: New: LILAC PIN – Come Inside
content: Glasgow’s LILAC PIN are at the centre of a blossoming music scene in the Scottish city, with their shadowy debut track, Easy clocking up a decent Soundcloud following and features from XFM and NME. Returning with their second offering, the duo look to launch themselves into 2015 with a real confidence. Come Inside is even more murkily mysterious than their debut track, taking a very much modern pop sound and merging it with the sort of intimidating songwriting more commonly associated with the likes of Nick Cave, like a twisted, eerie version of London Grammar. Check it out below.
author: 5e9b68b27a1236eccfeb1d27
